key.value: Add new values: Separate by comma

You need to enter language code that corresponds to Alpha-2 ISO language tags.

Example: en-US or en-GB-custom.

key.value: Are you sure you want to update '{$name}' theme from version {$oldVersion} to {$newVersion}? The theme is commercial, to update it please enter license key and press 'Update' button.

key.name: input_settings_resource_list_desc
key.value: List domains from which you allow to embed videos or put iframes. These should be sites that provide embed code for videos or valid content which you entrust. One domain per line.

key.name: input_settings_user_custom_html_disable_desc
key.value: Check if you don't want to allow users write HTML code in posts (like blogs and forums). Recommended for security reasons.

key.name: input_settings_user_rich_media_disable_desc
key.value: Check if you don't want to allow people to add rich media (like photo and video) in posts (like blogs and forums).

key.value:
This will render your site inaccessible and show everyone maintenance message.

You will still be able to sign in as admin here: {$site_url}sign-in

key.value: Disable your site and put up the maintenance page.

key.name: maintenance_text_value
key.value:
Under maintenance.

Sorry, the site is undergoing planned maintenance. We'll be back soon.

key.value: You can't change values set in this question

key.value: You can't delete an account type while it still has exclusive profile quesitons.

key.name: questions_add_values_description
key.value: You can add up to 31 values

key.name: questions_cant_delete_default_account_type
key.value: You can't delete default account type.

key.name: questions_cant_delete_last_account_type
key.value: You can't delete this account type. At least 1 account type must be on the site.

key.name: questions_delete_account_type_confirmation
key.value:
WAIT! Are you sure you want to delete this account type?
Remember: Users with this account: 1) will lose profile information associated tothis account type; 2) will not be able to use the site until they sign in, choose a different account type, and enter necessary information.

key.name: questions_delete_question_confirmation
key.value: Are you sure you want to delete this question?

key.name: questions_delete_question_parent_confirmation
key.value:
Are you sure you want to delete this question?
ATTENTION: IT WILL PERMANENTLY DELETE ANSWERS FOR THIS QUESTION IN USER PROFILES.
This question also has a dependent question(s) {$questions}. IT WILL BE REMOVED WITH ALL PROFILE INFO AS WELL.

key.name: questions_delete_section_confirmation
key.value: Are you sure you want to delete this section?

key.name: questions_delete_section_confirmation_with_move_questions
key.value:
Are you sure you want to delete this section?
All profile questions belonging to this section will be moved to the "{$sectionName}" section.

key.name: questions_edit_username_warning
key.value: We recommend against making username field editable, because changing username will result in changing the profile URL.

key.name: questions_for_account_type_description
key.value: Select an appropriate account type for the question only if it doesn't fit other types. E.g.: Gender corresponds to Single but doesn't fit Couple.

key.name: questions_index_drag_n_drop_info_txt
key.value: Drag'n'drop questions and sections to change their order.

key.name: questions_index_info_txt
key.value: Here you can change information added by users about themselves. You can change, rearrange, and add new profile questions.

key.name: questions_matched_question_values
key.value: This question is matched with {$label}

key.name: questions_on_edit_description
key.value: The question should be available for user to edit

key.name: questions_on_search_description
key.value: The question should be used for User Search

key.name: questions_on_sing_up_description
key.value: The question should be on the registration page

key.name: questions_on_view_description
key.value: The question should be shown on profile view page

key.name: questions_page_description

Here you can change information added by users about themselves.
You can change, rearrange, and add new profile questions.

key.name: questions_possible_values_description
key.value: You can add up to 31 values

key.name: questions_required_description
key.value: The form will not submit if the user doesn't enter valid answer for this question

key.name: questions_section_info_txt
key.value: If you have a lot of profile questions you may want to divide them into sections. You might have the following sections "Basic info", "Contacts", "Interests", so on and so forth.
